alert.note: Alert for Crowley County Including Ordway; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 17 at 4:04AM MDT until April 17 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning is in effect today from 12 PM to 8 PM for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 222, 224, 225, 226, 227, 228, 229, 230, 231, 232, and 233 which includes the San Luis Valley, the Sangre de Cristo and Wet Mountains, Fremont and Teller Counties, the I-25 corridor, Crowley, Otero, and eastern Las Animas Counties... ...Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Monday afternoon through Monday evening for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 224 and 225 which includes the San Luis Valley, and the Sangre de Cristo and Wet Mountains... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221... 231...232 AND 233... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low humidity values, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221...231...232 and 233. * Winds...West northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Timing...Noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County Including Ordway; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument
